reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress gorgeous and well-made, with a flattering shape that works well with heels. The material is soft and thick enough, and customers appreciate its comfort. The slit size receives mixed feedback - while many love the slits on both sides, some note that they go up very high.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress!! Doesn’t disappoint. Beautiful all around!
items.body: Such a perfect dress! True to size, excellent quality of material. It’s just as pictured and beautifully made. I was quite satisfied when I put it on. Fits like a dream and easy to walk in. Perfect dress for a wedding guest. Color was just as beautiful and vibrant as the photo. I loved it so much, I may actually considering purchasing in different colors! Read more
items.author: Ashley Cruz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Absolutely stunning dress! I wore this to my company holiday party, and I got so many compliments. Fits like a dream, material is stretchy and comfy. It’s pretty thick material too. I will say I didnt realize how high the side slits were. Sitting down was….tricky. But overall, amazing dress for an incredible price. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The winner of 4 for a wedding
items.body: I am 5’6” 140# weight evenly distributed. Ordered 4 dresses last minute not knowing I needed a long dress for an upcoming wedding. This one was the winner. The neck and arm holes fit well (not low or bunching) & length was right for low heel. Slits were VERY high such that when I walked it showed all the way up to top of my thighs, so I made 2 small stitches about thumb length down to prevent it from splitting higher up (and showing my shapewear). Material is thick enough (esp with shapewear) to look very smooth. Only wish dresses like these came with some subtle patterns/colors as I think patterns are more figure flattering than solid dresses. The color was great for a fall wedding. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, stretch, style and comfort. True to size
items.body: Great quality, stretch, style and comfort. True to size Can dress up or down. Long Length Read more
items.author: Holly Greear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Great fit and looks wonderful. Lightweight but didn’t feel cheap. Got lots of compliments. I usually wear a size 18 and the XXL fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great multi purpose dress for many occasions!
items.body: Great fit and perfect for a Ball. Not see through, good material thickness, true to size, comfortable but has zipper in the back so will need assistance to zip/unzip. Fabric has some give but not stretchy. Wore with Cowboy Boots and received many compliments!! Read more
items.author: Rebecca Ferris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit, Beautiful Color
items.body: I bought this green dress and honestly, I love how it fits! It's so flattering on my body type and feels really comfortable to wear. The color is gorgeous and the fabric feels nice. What I really appreciate is how practical it is too. I can move around easily in it - no tight spots or awkward pulling. The fabric doesn't wrinkle much, which is great because I hate having to constantly worry about how I look throughout the day. Plus it's easy to care for, which is always a win for me. The only thing is that it's pretty long on me since I'm 4'11". I knew it might be an issue when I ordered it, but I loved everything else about the dress. It's definitely something to consider if you're on the shorter side like me - you might need to get it hemmed or just be okay with a longer look. But seriously, other than the length, this dress is perfect. It fits exactly how I wanted it to, looks really good on, and actually works for my lifestyle. I'd definitely recommend it, just maybe check the measurements if you're petite! Read more
items.author: Kate

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress, but That Slit is No Joke
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous, and the color is rich, the halter neckline is flattering, and the fabric has a nice, smooth drape. I bought it for a formal event and was blown away by how elegant and form-fitting it looked right out of the package. However… let’s talk about the slit. It’s high. I’m 5'7", and the slit came all the way up to the top of my thigh, which made sitting, walking, and dancing a little difficult. The zipper was a little difficult to zip up, but once it's on it feels nice and not too clingy. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Maxi Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Maxi Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Teal Color, Purple, Burgundy, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
